metadata.title: CVE-2023-52573 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:rds: Fix possible NULL-pointer dereference Inrds_rdma_cm_event_handler_cmn() check, if conn pointer exists beforedereferencing it as rdma_set_service_type() argument Found by LinuxVerification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
